description: The Logitech MX Master 3 is an advanced wireless mouse designed for productivity. It features ultrafast and precise scrolling, customizable buttons, and ergonomic design for comfortable use.
The Apple Magic Keyboard is a sleek and responsive keyboard with a scissor mechanism, offering a comfortable typing experience for Mac users.
The Samsung 32-inch 4K UHD Monitor delivers stunning picture quality and sharp resolution, ideal for multimedia consumption, productivity, and gaming.
The Seagate Expansion 4TB External Hard Drive offers a large storage capacity for backing up files, expanding storage, and easy plug-and-play functionality.
The HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset provides excellent sound quality and comfort, perfect for gamers with its immersive audio experience and durable build.
The Anker 10-Port USB 3.0 Data Hub expands connectivity options, allowing multiple devices to be connected to your computer with high-speed data transfer.
The Blue Yeti USB Microphone is a versatile and high-quality mic suitable for streaming, podcasting, voiceovers, and professional-level recording.
The Lamicall Adjustable Laptop Stand is a sturdy and ergonomic stand designed to improve airflow and posture while working with a laptop.

productName: APC Back-UPS Pro 1500VA UPS Battery Backup & Surge Protector
description: The APC Back-UPS Pro 1500VA UPS Battery Backup & Surge Protector provides battery backup during power outages, surge protection, and energy-saving features for connected devices.

productName: Wacom Intuos Pro Graphics Drawing Tablet
description: The Wacom Intuos Pro Graphics Drawing Tablet is an advanced tool for digital artists and designers, offering precision and sensitivity for creative work.
